languages.text: {n}Ван Калокс переводит взгляд на Маражая, который с издевательским выражением надежды на лице смотрит то на вас, то на дознавателя.{/n} "Урок, который будет воспринят правильно".
{n}Van Calox turns his gaze to Marazhai, who glances at you and the Interrogator with mocking hope on his face.{/n} "A lesson that will fully sink in."
languages.original_text: {n}Ван Калокс переводит взгляд на Маражая, который с издевательским выражением надежды на лице смотрит то на вас, то на дознавателя.{/n} "Урок, который будет воспринят правильно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Van Calox turns his gaze to Marazhai, who glances at you and at the Interrogator with a mocking hope on his face.{/n} "The lesson that will be understood properly."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Van Calox turns his gaze to Marazhai, who glances at you and at the Interrogator with a mocking hope on his face.{/n} "The lesson that will be understood properly."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Van Calox turns his gaze to Marazhai, who glances at you and the Interrogator with mocking hope on his face.{/n} "A lesson that will fully sink in."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希将目光转向玛拉斋，玛拉斋瞥了你和审讯官一眼，故意做出可怜兮兮的表情。{/n}“希望你能吸取这个教训。”
languages.original_text: {n}Van Calox turns his gaze to Marazhai, who glances at you and the Interrogator with mocking hope on his face.{/n} "A lesson that will fully sink in."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希将目光转向玛拉斋，玛拉斋瞥了你和审判官一眼，故意做出可怜兮兮的表情。{/n}“希望你能吸取这个教训。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Van Calox dirige su mirada a Marazhai, que os mira de soslayo al interrogador y a ti con una expresión de falsa esperanza.{/n} «Una lección que se tomará muy a pecho».
languages.original_text: {n}Van Calox turns his gaze to Marazhai, who glances at you and the Interrogator with mocking hope on his face.{/n} "A lesson that will fully sink in."

traits.locale_text: {n}Van Calox dirige su mirada a Marazhai, que os mira de soslayo al interrogador y a ti con una expresión de falsa esperanza.{/n} «Una lección que se tomará muy a pecho».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se tourne vers Marazhai. Ce dernier vous lance, ainsi qu'à l'interrogateur, un regard rempli d'espoir feint.{/n} « Une leçon qui sera valable pour d'autres individus également. »
languages.original_text: {n}Van Calox turns his gaze to Marazhai, who glances at you and the Interrogator with mocking hope on his face.{/n} "A lesson that will fully sink in."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se tourne vers Marazhai. Ce dernier vous lance, ainsi qu'à l'interrogateur, un regard rempli d'espoir feint.{/n} « Une leçon qui sera valable pour d'autres individus également. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Van Calox wendet seinen Blick zu Marazhai, der dich und den Interrogator mit spöttischer Hoffnung anblickt.{/n} "Eine Lektion bis auf die Knochen."
languages.original_text: {n}Van Calox turns his gaze to Marazhai, who glances at you and the Interrogator with mocking hope on his face.{/n} "A lesson that will fully sink in."

traits.locale_text: {n}Van Calox wendet seinen Blick zu Marazhai, der dich und den Interrogator mit spöttischer Hoffnung anblickt.{/n} "Eine Lektion bis auf die Knochen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ヴァン・カロックスはマラズハイに視線を向ける。マラズハイは嘲笑うような表情で、あなたとインテロゲイターを見やる。{/n}「身に染みる教訓となるでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Van Calox turns his gaze to Marazhai, who glances at you and the Interrogator with mocking hope on his face.{/n} "A lesson that will fully sink in."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴァン・カロックスはマラズハイに視線を向ける。マラズハイは嘲笑うような表情で、あなたとインテロゲイターを見やる。{/n}「身に染みる教訓となるでしょう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Van Calox, bakışlarını yüzünde dalga geçermişçesine bir umutla sana ve Sorgucu'ya bakan Marazhai'a çeviriyor.{/n} "Asla unutamayacağı bir ders."
languages.original_text: {n}Van Calox turns his gaze to Marazhai, who glances at you and the Interrogator with mocking hope on his face.{/n} "A lesson that will fully sink in."

traits.locale_text: {n}Van Calox, bakışlarını yüzünde dalga geçermişcesine bir umutla sana ve Sorgucu'ya bakan Marazhai'a çeviriyor.{/n} "Asla unutamayacağı bir ders."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
